meanings.definition: Having or showing a strong desire for sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: She felt hornier than ever before.
meanings.sent2: He becomes hornier whenever he sees her.
meanings.sent3: The romantic movie made her feel even hornier.
meanings.sent4: The spicy food made him feel hornier than a teenager.
meanings.sent5: The summer heat seemed to make everyone feel hornier than usual.

meanings.definition: More sexually aroused or excited than usual.
meanings.sent1: After the romantic dinner, she felt hornier than ever.
meanings.sent2: He was hornier than usual after watching the steamy movie.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment made her feel even hornier.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of the surprise made him feel hornier than a rabbit.
meanings.sent5: The thrilling roller coaster ride left everyone feeling hornier than expected.
